entries.title: Progress!
entries.text: today I made substancial progress in the development of the application

entries.title: frustration
entries.text: it´s getting a little frustrating to get chatgpt to add the entry text field to the bottom of the other form fields but I´ll not give up

entries.title: finally!!!
entries.text: it appears the AI finally managed to place the entry text at the correct position, seems like the trick is to know exactly what to ask
